input.sentences: first came the procession by candle .
the group arrived and waited solemnly by the windows .
afterwards they all enjoyed the buffet dinner .
that gave them energy to dance the night away .
they all danced as the band played along .
output.sentences: It's important to light the candles before we eat.
Afterwards, we say a little prayer to express our thanks for this lovely gathering.
The food was definitely worth the trip.
And the dancing was definitely the highlight of our evening.
At the end of the day we got the band together and played a few tunes before saying goodbye.
